item.description:
Enjoy dinner at a Watertown eatery, then swing dance the night away with your Mosaic friends, at an event held by the Boston Swing Dance Network. We will meet for dinner at 6:30 p.m at a restaurant that will be sent to those who register. Following dinner, put your dancing shoes on and join the beginner lesson which starts at at 8 p.m. Then show off your moves during the dance portion of the evening, from 9 to 12. Featuring live music by Sax Gordon & the Little Town Rockers. Please bring clean shoes to dance in. For more information visit: www.bostonswingdance.com

Event's Leaders: Jane G and Hal K

MEET: We will meet for dinner at at at 6:30 p.m. (restaurant will be sent to those who register), or later at St. James Armenian Hall, Mt. Auburn St., Watertown. 
COST: Dance is $15. Dinner & a $5 charge for Meetups participants and guests which can be credited to a full Mosaic membership of $25.
item.how_to_find_us: Hal or Jane will respond to people who have sent a rsvp

group.name: Mosaic Jewish Outdoor Club of Massachusetts

item.name: A night for Dinner and Swing Dancing
